content: Note When building the website, you can set a theme by using --theme option. However, we suggest you modify the configuration file (config.toml) and set the theme as the default.
title: First_post

content: 2.4 Create Your First Post Here is the way to create your first post: 1 hugo new posts/first_post.md Feel free to edit the post file by adding some sample content and replacing the title value in the beginning of the file.
title: First_post
